translation.en: [Johnny Cash] I thank God for all the freedoms we've got in this country.
translation.zh: 我感谢上帝赐予这个国家的人民自由

translation.en: -I cherish them. -[cheering continues]
translation.zh: 我珍惜这些自由

translation.en: Even the rights to burn the flag, you know, I'm proud of those rights.
translation.zh: 即使是焚烧国旗的权利 我为那些权利感到自豪

translation.en: -[crowd shouting, booing] -But I'll tell you what,
translation.zh: 但我要告诉你们

translation.en: we've also got-- Let me tell you something. Shh.
translation.zh: 我们也有…让我告诉你们一件事

translation.en: We've also got a right to bear arms, and if you burn my flag, I'll shoot you.
translation.zh: 我们也有持有武器的权利 如果你焚烧我的国旗 我可以射你

translation.en: But I'll shoot you with a lot of love, like a good American.
translation.zh: 但我会用很多爱来射你 像个好美国人

translation.en: [Mark Stielper] In the '60s and '70s, America was torn apart
translation.zh: 在20世纪60和70年代 美国被种族

translation.en: around issues of race, war, peace,
translation.zh: 战争、和平等议题所撕裂

translation.en: and a battle for the heart and soul of what it meant to be an American patriot.
translation.zh: 还有一场心灵之战 作为美国爱国者意味着什么

translation.en: [Nixon] We will determine what kind of nation America will be.
translation.zh: 我们将决定美国是什么样的国家

translation.en: [Cash] It's the prettiest country in the world that we've got.
translation.zh: 我们有世界上最美的国家

translation.en: -There ain't nothing like it anywhere. -[applause]
translation.zh: 独树一帜的

translation.en: Mr. Nixon said Johnny Cash speaks to all America.
translation.zh: 尼克松先生称 约翰尼卡什能和全美国产生共鸣

translation.en: [Aram Bakshian] He understood Johnny Cash's symbolic importance.
translation.zh: 他理解约翰尼卡什重要的象征意义

translation.en: [Nixon speaking on tape] Country music is the Johnny Cash crowd.
translation.zh: 乡村音乐是约翰尼卡什帮

translation.en: -[aide] It gets you elected. -[Nixon] Yeah. You know, it's Southern.
translation.zh: （尼克松总统秘密录音） 能让你当选 你知道 这里是南方

translation.en: [Pat Buchanan] Nixon wanted to identify with Middle America,
translation.zh: 尼克松想得到美国中产阶级的认同

translation.en: and Johnny Cash was as Middle America as you can get.
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什是最好的中产阶级人选

translation.en: [Joanne Cash] We got a phone call from the White House. It was President Nixon.
translation.zh: 我们接到白宫的电话 是尼克松总统

translation.en: He had invited Johnny to sing and do a concert there.
translation.zh: 他邀请约翰尼献唱 并在那里开演唱会

translation.en: [Stielper] President Nixon requested that John sing
translation.zh: 尼克松总统要求约翰唱

translation.en: redneck country music songs,
translation.zh: 南方劳工阶级乡村乐歌曲

translation.en: affiliating country music with the president's cause,
translation.zh: 乡村音乐和总统的事业联系在一起

translation.en: and the result was just catastrophic.
translation.zh: 结果就是灾难

translation.en: How could the president be so mean-spirited?
translation.zh: 总统的心胸怎会如此狭窄？

translation.en: Johnny was very, very conflicted.
translation.zh: 约翰尼的内心非常矛盾

translation.en: It was a defining moment for him.
translation.zh: 对他来说是关键时刻

translation.en: [announcer] Ladies and gentlemen, Johnny Cash!
translation.zh: 女士们、先生们 有请约翰尼卡什

translation.en: Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢 谢谢

translation.en: [Stielper] Who was going to show up to the White House?
translation.zh: 谁会在白宫出现？

translation.en: Johnny Cash of "Folsom Prison Blues,"
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什 代表作《福尔瑟姆监狱蓝调》

translation.en: "The Rebel"...
translation.zh: 《反叛者》…

translation.en: So, what do you want to hear?
translation.zh: 那么为什么你们来这里？

translation.en: [Stielper] ...the guy who was photographed flippin' off the man,
translation.zh: 被拍到朝人竖中指的人

translation.en: or the God-fearing family man with a baby on the way,
translation.zh: 或是即将当爸爸的 虔诚的居家男人

translation.en: gospel-singing Johnny Cash.
translation.zh: 福音歌手约翰尼卡什

translation.en: How do you be both?
translation.zh: 你要如何身兼二职呢？

translation.en: What did Johnny Cash stand for?
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什代表了什么？

translation.en: Carl Perkins wrote a song that tells about the reason for it all.
translation.zh: 卡尔帕金斯写过一首歌 告诉了我们这一切的原因

translation.en: It takes us back home and again,
translation.zh: 带我们回家 又一次

translation.en: tells it like it was when I was a little-bitty kid
translation.zh: 就好像我们回到孩提时代

translation.en: and we gathered around the piano,
translation.zh: 我们围坐在钢琴旁

translation.en: and me and little brother would join in and Mama'd sing tenor and Daddy sang bass.
translation.zh: 我和弟弟会加入 妈妈唱高音 爸爸唱低音

translation.en: ♪ I remember when I was a lad Times were hard and things were bad... ♪
translation.zh: 我记得自己小时候 万事艰难

translation.en: Johnny was born in Kingsland,
translation.zh: 约翰尼在金士兰出生… （乔安妮卡什 约翰尼的妹妹/音乐家）

translation.en: in south Arkansas.
translation.zh: （乔安妮卡什 约翰尼的妹妹/音乐家） …位于阿肯色州南部

translation.en: ♪ Just poor people That's all we were ♪
translation.zh: 就是一帮一无所有的穷人

translation.en: ♪ Trying to make a living Out of black land dirt ♪
translation.zh: 想在肮脏的黑土地上讨生活

translation.en: ♪ We'd get together In a family circle singing loud... ♪
translation.zh: 我们团结在一起 一家人齐声高唱

translation.en: When my family came to Dyess, Johnny was three years old.
translation.zh: 我们一家人到戴斯的时候 约翰尼才三岁

translation.en: ♪ Singin' seems to help a troubled soul ♪
translation.zh: 唱歌似乎能帮助受困的灵魂

translation.en: ♪ One of these days and it won't be long ♪
translation.zh: 总有一天 不会太久

translation.en: ♪ I'll rejoin them in a song ♪
translation.zh: 我会在歌声中和他们重聚

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna join the family circle At the Throne ♪
translation.zh: 我会和家人团聚 在王座前

translation.en: [Cash] Now each one of these houses had a barn,
translation.zh: （约翰尼卡什童年故居 阿肯色州戴斯） 每个房子都有谷仓

translation.en: a chicken house, and a smoke-house where the farmers raised their own hogs
translation.zh: 鸡舍和农民用来养猪的烟熏室

translation.en: and cured their meat.
translation.zh: 他们还在里面腌肉

translation.en: And they had a mule and 20 acres of land here.
translation.zh: 他们还有一头骡子和120亩土地

translation.en: It was a beautiful little place.
translation.zh: 这是个美丽的小地方

translation.en: The Dyess, Arkansas experience was part of FDR's New Deal.
translation.zh: （马克史提普 约翰尼的朋友/家族历史学家） 阿肯色州戴斯的经验 是罗斯福新政的一部分

translation.en: They moved people from terrible situations where they had no hope, no future,
translation.zh: 他们迁移贫困人口 在当地那些人没有希望和未来

translation.en: and gave them an opportunity.
translation.zh: 并给他们机会

translation.en: ♪ My clothes may be ragged And my shoes may be worn ♪
translation.zh: 我的衣服和鞋子也许破烂

translation.en: ♪ But I've been a wealthy boy Since I've been born... ♪
translation.zh: 但从我出生起就是个富足的孩子…

translation.en: We were a happy family. We didn't know we were poor.
translation.zh: 我们是很幸福的一家人 不觉得自己穷… （汤米卡什 约翰尼的弟弟/音乐家）

translation.en: We always had plenty to eat and plenty of clothes.
translation.zh: …而且我们总是衣食无忧

translation.en: We were happy to be part of the American dream.
translation.zh: 我们很开心能成为美国梦的一部分

translation.en: [Joanne] Our family would start the day in the cotton fields,
translation.zh: 每天伊始 我们一家人会在棉花地里唱歌

translation.en: singing old church hymns and songs that we all knew, we'd sing together.
translation.zh: 每天伊始 我们一家人会在棉花地里唱歌 老的教会圣歌和大家都会唱的歌 我们一起唱

translation.en: Gospel songs or country songs
translation.zh: 福音歌曲或乡村歌曲

translation.en: because it's about our life with the Lord.
translation.zh: 因为这是关于我们与主的生活

translation.en: Johnny's grandfather was a hellfire preacher.
translation.zh: 约翰尼的爷爷是地狱火传教士

translation.en: He had preacher grandparents on multiple lines of his family tree.
translation.zh: 他的家族里面出过很多的传教士

translation.en: They spoke of hell and damnation,
translation.zh: 他们相信地狱和天谴

translation.en: and what it was like if you did not live the right kind of a life.
translation.zh: 以及不好好过日子死后的下场

translation.en: John was a dyed-in-the-wool conservative person
translation.zh: 约翰是地地道道的保守人士… （杰米斯诺 约翰尼的牧师）

translation.en: because his parents were. He was from that part of Arkansas.
translation.zh: …因为他父母就是那样的人 他来自阿肯色州的保守地区

translation.en: I don't remember anybody in our family criticizing the government.
translation.zh: 我不记得家里有人批评过政府

translation.en: We were patriotic no matter who the president was.
translation.zh: 我们是爱国者 不管谁当总统

translation.en: We loved to see the American flag flown.
translation.zh: 我们乐于见到美国国旗飘扬

translation.en: My daddy flew it every day until the day he died.
translation.zh: 我爸爸有生之年每天都升国旗

translation.en: Johnny loved America.
translation.zh: 约翰尼热爱美国

translation.en: He believed that you should support your government
translation.zh: （卢罗宾 约翰尼的经理） 他认为你应该支持政府

translation.en: and support the president.
translation.zh: 支持总统

translation.en: [Joanne] He was one of the most patriotic men I've ever known.
translation.zh: 他是我认识的人里面最爱国的人之一

translation.en: In 1968, the idea of patriotism itself
translation.zh: 1968年 爱国主义本身… （比尔齐伯曼 反战活动人士/作家）

translation.en: became controversial.
translation.zh: …变得极具争议

translation.en: [Nixon] As we look at America, we see cities enveloped in smoke and flames.
translation.zh: 我们看到全美多个城市 笼罩在烟雾和火光中

translation.en: We hear sirens in the night.
translation.zh: 夜间听见警笛声

translation.en: We see Americans dying on distant battlefields abroad.
translation.zh: 我们看见美国人 在国外遥远的战场上死去

translation.en: We see Americans hating each other, fighting each other,
translation.zh: （焚烧征兵卡） 我们看见美国人互相厌恶 互相斗争

translation.en: killing each other at home.
translation.zh: 在家乡自相残杀

translation.en: It was a period where
translation.zh: 那个时期… （阿拉姆巴克希 尼克松演讲稿撰稿人）

translation.en: lots of stuff came to a boil at the same time.
translation.zh: （阿拉姆巴克希 尼克松演讲稿撰稿人） …很多事情同时爆发

translation.en: We not only have a right to be free, we have a duty to be free.
translation.zh: （人民享有自由正义吗？） 我们不仅有自由的权利 还有自由的义务

translation.en: [Bakshian] There were civil rights protests.
translation.zh: 有民权抗议活动

translation.en: There was this unpopular war.
translation.zh: 有不得人心的战争

translation.en: We will prevail in Vietnam over the Communist aggressor!
translation.zh: 我们将在越南战胜共产主义侵略者

translation.en: The country split into what has come to be called hawks and doves.
translation.zh: 美国分裂成了所谓的鹰派和鸽派

translation.en: Doves wanted to end the war.
translation.zh: 鸽派想要结束战争

translation.en: Hawks wanted to pursue the war.
translation.zh: 鹰派想要发动战争

translation.en: -[man] What do you want? -[all] Peace! -[man] When do we get it? -[all] Now!
translation.zh: 你们想要什么？和平 我们何时得到？现在

translation.en: And these two sides, both Americans,
translation.zh: 这两派都是美国人… （结束河内庇护）

translation.en: both claiming to be patriots, went to war with each other.
translation.zh: …都声称自己是爱国者 相互开战

translation.en: [Bakshian] It was the perfect storm,
translation.zh: 这是完美风暴

translation.en: and Nixon understood that.
translation.zh: 尼克松心知肚明

translation.en: And I pledge to you tonight that the first priority
translation.zh: 今晚我向你们保证 （共和党全国代表大会 1968年8月8日）

translation.en: foreign policy objective of our next administration
translation.zh: （共和党全国代表大会 1968年8月8日） 下届政府外交目标的首要任务

translation.en: will be to bring an honorable end to the war in Vietnam.
translation.zh: 会是光荣地结束在越南的战争

translation.en: Nixon lost the 1960 presidential election to Kennedy,
translation.zh: 1960年的总统选举 尼克松输给了肯尼迪

translation.en: and he was traumatized by that defeat.
translation.zh: 那次失败对他是个打击

translation.en: In 1968, he was running for president
translation.zh: 1968年 他再次竞选总统

translation.en: in a desperate attempt to resurrect his career.
translation.zh: 孤注一掷地想要恢复他的事业

translation.en: The time has come for honest government in the United States of America!
translation.zh: 美国廉洁政府的时代已经来临

translation.en: -Thank you! -Thank you, girls.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -谢谢 姑娘们

translation.en: My father was never afraid to stand up for someone in need.
translation.zh: 我父亲从不惧怕 为有困难的人挺身而出

translation.en: And he would always put himself in a position to help those if he could.
translation.zh: （约翰卡特卡什 约翰尼的儿子 音乐家/制作人） 他总是力所能及地帮助其他人

translation.en: It was that simplicity that was within the heart of the man.
translation.zh: 就是他内心深处的那种简单

translation.en: It wasn't the complications of politics.
translation.zh: 不是复杂的政治

translation.en: [Cash] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [John Carter] I think that empathy goes back to the loss of his brother.
translation.zh: 我认为那种同情心跟他失去哥哥有关

translation.en: ♪ Beside a singin' mountain stream... ♪
translation.zh: 在山溪旁歌唱…

translation.en: Growing up, my father and his brother, Jack, were dearest of friends.
translation.zh: 成长过程中 我父亲和他哥哥杰克 是最要好的朋友

translation.en: Jack was a man of God at 14 years old.
translation.zh: 杰克14岁就成为上帝的子民

translation.en: He studied the Bible all the time.
translation.zh: 他经常研读《圣经》

translation.en: He knew in his heart that he was going to be a pastor.
translation.zh: 他从小就立志要当牧师

translation.en: They were so inseparable.
translation.zh: 他们两个人形影不离

translation.en: ♪ But flesh and blood Needs flesh and blood ♪
translation.zh: 但血肉之躯需要血肉之躯

translation.en: ♪ And you are what I need ♪
translation.zh: 你就是我需要的

translation.en: On Saturdays, Johnny, Jack, and my other brothers,
translation.zh: 每个周六 约翰尼 杰克和我的其他兄弟

translation.en: all of us, would do odd jobs to help Mama with the groceries.
translation.zh: 我们所有人都会打零工 帮妈妈买杂货

translation.en: In May of 1944, Jack was sawing some fence post.
translation.zh: 1944年5月 杰克在锯一些栅栏

translation.en: As he was pushing the fence post into the saw,
translation.zh: 他把栅栏推进锯机的时候

translation.en: it jerked... and jerked him into the saw.
translation.zh: 机器把他卷了进去

translation.en: It was beyond horrible.
translation.zh: 现场惨不忍睹

translation.en: I remember Johnny crying and holding his hand,
translation.zh: 我记得约翰尼哭着拉着他的手

translation.en: saying, "Somebody do something!"
translation.zh: 说：“来人救命啊”

translation.en: It was as bad as you can imagine.
translation.zh: 情况非常的惨烈

translation.en: The next day after the funeral,
translation.zh: 葬礼后的第二天

translation.en: we were all back in the cotton fields, working.
translation.zh: 我们都回到棉花田工作

translation.en: I can't even describe the emptiness and the hurt.
translation.zh: 我无法形容那种空虚和伤痛

translation.en: [Stielper] Ray and Carrie,
translation.zh: 雷和凯莉

translation.en: Johnny's mother and father, and 12-year-old Johnny
translation.zh: 约翰尼的父母和12岁的约翰尼

translation.en: are the ones that had to shoulder that burden.
translation.zh: 是肩负重担的人

translation.en: It was back-breaking.
translation.zh: 真的非常辛苦

translation.en: They were working every day and not getting anywhere.
translation.zh: 他们每天工作 但依然一贫如洗

translation.en: Ray Cash, who had thought Dyess was his promised land,
translation.zh: 雷卡什觉得戴斯是他的应许之地

translation.en: found that it wasn't.
translation.zh: 后来发现并不是

translation.en: Jack was going to be a preacher.
translation.zh: 杰克立志要当牧师

translation.en: He was going to be the son of Dyess that made it.
translation.zh: 他原本会是成功的戴斯之子

translation.en: Johnny was a very sensitive young man.
translation.zh: 约翰尼是非常敏感的年轻人

translation.en: There was not room for sensitivity.
translation.zh: 那里容不下敏感

translation.en: There was not room for dreamers in Dyess, Arkansas in the 1940s.
translation.zh: 20世纪40年代的阿肯色州 戴斯容不下梦想者

translation.en: Ray became so bitter, he resented his son.
translation.zh: 雷变得苦大仇深 他讨厌自己的儿子

translation.en: He would look at Johnny and he would say, "You weren't the right son.
translation.zh: 他会看着约翰尼说 “你不是我要的儿子

translation.en: You should've died."
translation.zh: 你应该去死”

translation.en: Johnny Cash grew up feeling unworthy of being himself.
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什成长过程中 觉得自己是没用的人

translation.en: He felt that he would never measure up
translation.zh: 他觉得自己永远无法达到

translation.en: to what his father wanted him to be.
translation.zh: 父亲对他的期望

translation.en: Something happened within my dad,
translation.zh: 我爸爸遭遇不幸

translation.en: and there was this deep wound that was placed there,
translation.zh: 使他内心深处有创伤

translation.en: this hollow well.
translation.zh: 这个空井

translation.en: There was also a drive that was installed,
translation.zh: 也让他下定决心

translation.en: and all these different faces that were Johnny Cash were developed
translation.zh: 因为童年的失去亲人的痛苦 让约翰尼卡什发展出了

translation.en: through that great loss at an early age.
translation.zh: 不同的面貌

translation.en: A prison's a prison.
translation.zh: 监狱就是监狱

translation.en: And that's all it is.
translation.zh: 没什么好说的

translation.en: [June] I'm sure you'll enjoy him this afternoon.
translation.zh: 我确定今天下午你们会喜欢他的表演

translation.en: He seems to have a lot of things in common with you, Mr. Johnny Cash!
translation.zh: 他好像有很多事要和你们聊 约翰尼卡什先生

translation.en: [John Carter] My father knew what it was like to suffer.
translation.zh: 我父亲知道痛苦的滋味

translation.en: He knew what it was like to feel lost.
translation.zh: 他知道失去的感觉

translation.en: And so, he could connect with other people's suffering.
translation.zh: 所以他能感同身受别人的痛苦

translation.en: He sang for those who needed something to believe in and needed to be lifted up.
translation.zh: 他为那些需要信仰和振作的人歌唱

translation.en: [Stielper] In January of 1968,
Johnny Cash went to Folsom Prison and performed for the inmates.
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什来到福尔瑟姆监狱 为囚犯们表演

translation.en: ♪ I hear the train a comin' It's rollin' 'round the bend ♪
translation.zh: 我听见火车来 它在拐弯处

translation.en: ♪ And I ain't seen the sunshine Since I don't know when ♪
translation.zh: 我没见过阳光 因为我不知道什么时候

translation.en: ♪ I'm stuck in Folsom Prison And time keeps draggin' on ♪
translation.zh: 自己被困在了 福尔瑟姆监狱 时光流逝

translation.en: -[crowd cheers] -Yeah!
translation.zh: 是啊！

translation.en: [Stielper] He looked on some of those guys in there,
translation.zh: 他看到那里的囚犯

translation.en: looked on the desperation in their eyes,
translation.zh: 看到他们眼中的绝望

translation.en: and he thought, "There but for the grace of God goes me.
translation.zh: 他心想 “因为有上帝的恩典

translation.en: I made some stumbles in my life.
translation.zh: 我的生命中也磕磕绊绊

translation.en: That could've been me."
translation.zh: 我也可能遭遇这种命运”

translation.en: ♪ But I shot a man in Reno Just to watch him die... ♪
translation.zh: 但我在雷诺射杀了一个人 眼睁睁看他死去…

translation.en: He brought recording equipment because he wanted people to hear
translation.zh: 他带去了录音设备 因为他想大家去听

translation.en: the rawness of what it was like to perform for these men.
translation.zh: 为这些人表演的这种原汁原味

translation.en: John always related to prisoners,
translation.zh: 约翰一直和囚犯有联系

translation.en: amongst others that had drug troubles.
translation.zh: 其中包括一些有毒瘾的人

translation.en: My father was full of love.
translation.zh: 我父亲是很有爱的人

translation.en: He was full of faith. He worked hard.
translation.zh: 他信心十足 工作努力

translation.en: He was self-made.
translation.zh: 他白手起家

translation.en: But he was also a man who hit hard rock bottom quite a few times.
translation.zh: 但他也是很多次跌到低谷的人

translation.en: Whether it's alcohol, drugs, whatever it is that changes your personality,
translation.zh: （唐里德 史泰特勒兄弟合唱团 与卡什一起巡演） 不管酒精还是毒品 都会改变你的个性

translation.en: your demeanor, your physical look, and he went through all of this.
translation.zh: 你的举止、你的外表 他都经历过

translation.en: [John Carter] He could be a liar.
translation.zh: 他说过谎

translation.en: He struggled. He made mistakes.
translation.zh: 他挣扎过 他犯过错误

translation.en: He was a different man when he was in that mode.
translation.zh: 他在那种状态下就变了一个人

translation.en: My father had never been an inmate,
translation.zh: 我父亲从来没坐过牢

translation.en: but they accepted him as one of their own.
translation.zh: 但他们把他当自己人

translation.en: He was a champion of the underdog and the downtrodden.
translation.zh: 他是弱者和受压迫者的捍卫者

translation.en: [interviewer] Do you have political leanings?
translation.zh: 你有政治倾向吗？

translation.en: No, not all that much.
translation.zh: 不能说有

translation.en: If somebody says,
translation.zh: 如果有人说

translation.en: "I'm not my brother's keeper," he's wrong 'cause he is.
translation.zh: “我不是我兄弟的守护者” 他错了 因为他是

translation.en: He is his brother's keeper.
translation.zh: 他是他兄弟的守护者

translation.en: [Stielper] In May 1968, Johnny Cash At Folsom Prison is released.
translation.zh: （福尔瑟姆监狱现场录音 约翰尼卡什《福尔瑟姆监狱蓝调》） 1968年5月 约翰尼卡什的 《福尔瑟姆监狱》专辑发行

translation.en: "Folsom Prison Blues" gets to number one.
translation.zh: 《福尔瑟姆监狱蓝调》 登上排行榜首位

translation.en: He is viewed as Johnny Cash, this rebel.
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什被视为反叛者

translation.en: And that appealed to a broad audience.
translation.zh: 那吸引了大批观众

translation.en: [John Carter] People responded to that rebel identity,
translation.zh: 人们喜欢那种反叛的形象

translation.en: but what was amazing is they'd think they knew him,
translation.zh: 但厉害的是他们觉得了解他

translation.en: and then he'd change.
translation.zh: 然后他变了

translation.en: The Album of the Year, Johnny Cash, At Folsom Prison!
translation.zh: 年度最佳专辑 约翰尼卡什的 《福尔瑟姆监狱蓝调》

translation.en: He had a lot of songs that he would cut as a country song,
translation.zh: 他有很多歌曲被录制成乡村音乐

translation.en: and it would spill over into the pop charts.
translation.zh: 结果称霸流行乐排行榜

translation.en: I think that was why he was so successful.
translation.zh: 我想那是他如此成功的原因

translation.en: There was no limit to who wanted to listen to Johnny Cash.
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什的歌迷 并不局限于某个群体

translation.en: [Stielper] By the late '60s, Johnny's star rises,
translation.zh: 到20世纪60年代末 约翰尼声名鹊起

translation.en: as does Mr. Nixon's.
translation.zh: 尼克松先生也一样

translation.en: He wins the presidency in 1968.
translation.zh: 1968年他当选总统

translation.en: Having lost a close one eight years ago and having won a close one this year,
translation.zh: 八年前惜败 今年险胜

translation.en: I can say this... winning's a lot more fun!
translation.zh: 我可以这么说：胜选更有意思！

translation.en: But we won narrowly, we won with 43% of the vote.
translation.zh: 但我们是险胜 赢得43%的选票 （巴特布坎南 尼克松的资深顾问）

translation.en: I, Richard Milhous Nixon, do solemnly swear...
translation.zh: 我 理查德米尔豪斯尼克松 郑重宣誓…

translation.en: That you will faithfully execute the office...
translation.zh: 你会忠实执行总统职务…

translation.en: That I will faithfully...
translation.zh: 我会忠实…

translation.en: The Southern strategy that Nixon used to win the 1968 presidential election
translation.zh: 尼克松使用南方策略 赢得1968年总统大选

translation.en: has been used by every Republican presidential candidate since.
translation.zh: 此策略此后被每位共和党 总统候选人使用

translation.en: The Southern strategy sends out dog whistles to racists
translation.zh: 南方策略对种族主义者发出狗哨

translation.en: and dog whistles to conservatives,
translation.zh: （烧越共比烧国旗好） 对保守主义者发出狗哨

translation.en: using key phrases like "the silent majority."
translation.zh: 使用关键词组 比如“沉默的大多数”

translation.en: The Southern strategy basically was to hold the South,
translation.zh: 南方策略基本上是稳住南方

translation.en: bringing those people into the Nixon Coalition.
translation.zh: 把那些人拉进尼克松联盟

translation.en: The essence was traditional conservatives and law and order,
translation.zh: 其本质是传统的保守主义 以及法律和秩序

translation.en: supporting Americans in Vietnam,
translation.zh: 支持在越南的美国人…

translation.en: standing up against the demonstrators who were against the war,
translation.zh: …站出来反对那些反战的示威者

translation.en: and basically representing the values and beliefs of Middle America
translation.zh: 基本上代表中产阶级的价值观和信仰

translation.en: against the rising social and cultural revolution in the country.
translation.zh: 反对国内兴起的社会和文化革命

translation.en: The peace of the world will depend not just on America's military might,
translation.zh: 世界和平不仅依赖于美国的军事实力

translation.en: which is the greatest in the world,
translation.zh: 我们有世界上最强大的军队

translation.en: but it's going to depend on our character,
translation.zh: 但也要依赖于我们的品格

translation.en: our love of our country,
translation.zh: 我们对国家的爱

translation.en: our willingness to not only wear the flag but stand up for the flag,
translation.zh: 我们愿意佩戴国旗 并且愿意为国旗挺身而出

translation.en: and country music does that.
translation.zh: 乡村音乐做到了这点

translation.en: [Buchanan] Throughout Nixon's entire presidency,
translation.zh: 贯穿尼克松的整个总统任期

translation.en: well, even into his second term,
translation.zh: 甚至是第二个总统任期

translation.en: he attempted to cultivate the support of the South.
translation.zh: 他都试图培养南方的支持

translation.en: [all] ♪ God bless America ♪
translation.zh: 天佑美国

translation.en: ♪ My home sweet home ♪
translation.zh: 我甜蜜的家乡

translation.en: Hello, I'm Johnny Cash.
translation.zh: 大家好 我是约翰尼卡什

translation.en: [Stielper] In 1969, The Johnny Cash Show first aired on national TV.
translation.zh: 1969年 约翰尼卡什秀 在全国电视上首播

translation.en: Oh, hi, there!
translation.zh: 哦 你们好

translation.en: It was a variety entertainment show,
translation.zh: 那是个综艺娱乐节目

translation.en: and it was unlike anything anyone had ever seen.
translation.zh: 跟之前的节目都不一样

translation.en: Certainly unlike anything that anybody had ever seen in country music.
translation.zh: 当然也不像人们 之前看过的乡村音乐表演

translation.en: ♪ He healed the leper and the lame... ♪
translation.zh: 他治愈了麻风病人和瘸子…

translation.en: [Stielper] He sings gospel songs.
translation.zh: 他唱福音歌曲

translation.en: Make welcome my brother, Tommy Cash.
translation.zh: 欢迎我的弟弟 汤米卡什

translation.en: Hey, Tommy! Welcome!
translation.zh: 嘿 汤米 欢迎

translation.en: ♪ He'd say do what you do, do well, boy! Do what you do, do well! ♪
translation.zh: （汤米卡什 约翰尼的弟弟/音乐家） 他说做你擅长的 孩子 做你擅长的

translation.en: [Stielper] It was a family affair all around.
translation.zh: 就是家庭聚会

translation.en: ♪ You say you're lookin' for someone Who's never weak ♪
translation.zh: 你说你在找一个永不软弱的人 （琼卡特卡什 约翰尼的妻子/音乐家）

translation.en: ♪ But always strong... ♪
translation.zh: 而是永远坚强…

translation.en: He puts on a special segment on every show called "Ride This Train."
translation.zh: 他在每场秀中都有一个特别单元 叫做“赶上这班火车”

translation.en: Ride this train with me to San Antonio, Texas;
translation.zh: 赶上这班火车在德州圣安东尼奥

translation.en: Springfield, Missouri; Boise, Idaho.
translation.zh: 密苏里春田和爱荷达州波夕制作

translation.en: It's a quintessentially American experience.
translation.zh: 这是典型的美国体验

translation.en: And he puts people on TV that nobody's ever seen before,
translation.zh: 他请来的人观众之前 从未在电视上见过

translation.en: but it's not just country people.
translation.zh: 但并不仅限于乡村音乐人

translation.en: Please make welcome Ms. Joni Mitchell.
translation.zh: 请欢迎琼妮米歇尔小姐

translation.en: ♪ Rows and flows of angel hair... ♪
translation.zh: 天使波浪似的长发飘动…

translation.en: [Stielper] Bob Dylan...
translation.zh: 鲍勃迪伦

translation.en: ♪ Love is all there is It makes the world go 'round... ♪
translation.zh: 爱无处无在 让世界转动起来…

translation.en: He puts on Pete Seeger.
translation.zh: 他请来了皮特西格

translation.en: -That's nice. [chuckles] -[applause]
translation.zh: 真好听

translation.en: [Stielper] These were all leaders of the anti-war movement.
translation.zh: 这些都是反战运动的领袖

translation.en: The people that I'm contracted with said that,
translation.zh: 我联络的人说

translation.en: "How dare you, supposedly such a good American,
translation.zh: “你这种良好的美国人胆敢

translation.en: have a Communist like Pete Seeger on your TV show?"
translation.zh: 邀请皮特西格 这样的共党分子上节目？”

translation.en: The Pete Seeger I know
translation.zh: 我认识的皮特西格

translation.en: and the Pete Seeger that June and I have come to love is,
translation.zh: 琼和我爱的皮特西格是

translation.en: I'd say, one of the best Americans and patriots I've ever known.
translation.zh: 我要说 是我认识的最好的美国人 和爱国者之一

translation.en: But Pete Seeger is not coming on there
translation.zh: 但皮特西格上节目

translation.en: and singing "Where Have All the Flowers Gone?"
translation.zh: 不是要唱《花都到哪里去了？》

translation.en: This is a non-political venue.
translation.zh: 这是个非政治节目

translation.en: [John Carter] My father did not adhere to any certain party.
translation.zh: 我父亲没有加入任何政党

translation.en: A Republican would claim him and also a Democrat would,
translation.zh: 民主和共和两党都称他是本党党员

translation.en: and my father wouldn't argue either point.
translation.zh: 我父亲也不去争辩

translation.en: ♪ I keep my eyes wide open all the time ♪
translation.zh: 我一直睁大眼睛…

translation.en: John walked a political line.
translation.zh: 约翰走政治路线

translation.en: ♪ I walk the line ♪
translation.zh: 我要勇往直前

translation.en: Yes, he tried. He tried to walk the line.
translation.zh: 是的 他试过 他试过走政治路线

translation.en: People will say, "Oh, he tried to have it both ways."
translation.zh: 人们会说：“哦 他想脚踏两只船”

translation.en: ♪ Because you're mine I walk the line... ♪
translation.zh: 因为你是我的 我要勇往直前

translation.en: This was in the midst of tremendous social turmoil.
translation.zh: 当时正处于 巨大的社会动荡中

translation.en: Johnny Cash doesn't get involved in that. He is not political.
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什没有参与其中 他对政治没有兴趣

translation.en: He does not take a stand.
translation.zh: 他没有表明立场

translation.en: I thank you very much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢

translation.en: While you could be neutral in the middle of those polarities,
translation.zh: 在那种对立 文化和政治氛围中

translation.en: culturally and politically, it was difficult.
translation.zh: 保持中立是很难的

translation.en: And the more time went by, the harder it was to be neutral.
translation.zh: 随着时间推移 保持中立就更难

translation.en: [chanting] Peace over war! Peace over war!
translation.zh: 和平停战

translation.en: Peace over war! Peace over war!
translation.zh: 和平停战

translation.en: [Buchanan] In the Fall of '69,
translation.zh: 1969年秋季

translation.en: a huge demonstration was planned
translation.zh: 一场大规模的示威游行

translation.en: to bring out hundreds of thousands of people
translation.zh: 成千上万的人走上街头

translation.en: to break the Nixon presidency on Vietnam.
translation.zh: 破坏尼克松总统的越南政策

translation.en: We have been too often disappointed by the optimism of the American leaders,
translation.zh: 我们常常对美国领导人的 乐观情绪感到失望

translation.en: both in Vietnam and Washington,
translation.zh: 不管是在越南还是华盛顿

translation.en: to have faith any longer...
translation.zh: 为了更有信心…

translation.en: When parts of the news media projected the failures of US policy,
translation.zh: 当部分新闻媒体预测到 美国政策失败时

translation.en: it began to create a gap
translation.zh: 就形成了一种分歧

translation.en: between what the government was telling us and what the news media started to report.
translation.zh: 政府的说法和新闻媒体的报道不一样

translation.en: In the midst of this war, we began to understand
translation.zh: 在这场战争中 我们开始明白

translation.en: that we were being lied to,
translation.zh: 我们被欺骗了

translation.en: and that further polarized society.
translation.zh: 这让社会进一步分化

translation.en: [Nixon] The radical fuel that you see on your television screens night after night,
translation.zh: 你每晚在电视上看到的激进煽动

translation.en: they're not a majority of American youth today
translation.zh: 他们不代表当今大多数的美国青年… （支持弹劾）

translation.en: and they will not be the leaders of America tomorrow.
translation.zh: …他们也不会成为美国未来的领袖

translation.en: Nixon was paranoid about these antiwar protesters,
translation.zh: 尼克松感到疑惑… （亚历山大巴特菲尔德 尼克松的副幕僚长） …这些反战人士大部分是年轻人

translation.en: most of whom were young.
translation.zh: …这些反战人士大部分是年轻人

translation.en: [crowd] One, two, three, four, Tricky Dick passed a law!
translation.zh: 一、二、三、四 狡猾的迪克通过一项法律 （尼克松扼杀儿童）

translation.en: He used to say to me sometimes, "What is it with these young people?
translation.zh: 他有时候会问我 “这些年轻人怎么了？

translation.en: What don't they understand?"
translation.zh: 他们理解不了吗？”

translation.en: We felt that we were being patriotic.
translation.zh: 我们觉得… （马上撤军停战） …我们是爱国的

translation.en: He wanted them to look shameful.
translation.zh: 他想让他们丢脸

translation.en: We're in the middle of a revolution.
translation.zh: 我们处于一场革命之中

translation.en: So, I told the president, "If we don't stand up here,
translation.zh: 所以我告诉总统 “如果我们不站稳脚跟

translation.en: your presidency is going to be broken."
translation.zh: 你的总统任期就将结束”

translation.en: Tonight I want to talk to you on a subject of deep concern to all Americans,
translation.zh: （1969年11月3日） 今晚我要谈论全美人民 都深刻关切的问题

translation.en: the war in Vietnam.
translation.zh: 在越南的战争

translation.en: The American people are entitled to know the truth...
translation.zh: 美国人民有权知道真相… （尼克松危机）

translation.en: but as President of the United States,
translation.zh: …但作为美国总统

translation.en: I would be untrue to my oath of office
translation.zh: 如果我让国家政策

translation.en: if I allowed the policy of this nation
translation.zh: 被街头少数示威分子影响

translation.en: to be dictated by the minority mounting demonstrations in the street.
translation.zh: 那就有违我的就职誓言

translation.en: North Vietnam cannot defeat or humiliate the United States.
translation.zh: 北越无法击败或羞辱美国

translation.en: Only Americans can do that.
translation.zh: 只有美国人才能做到

translation.en: And so tonight, to you,
translation.zh: 所以今晚 对于你们

translation.en: the great Silent Majority
translation.zh: 伟大的沉默的大多数

translation.en: of my fellow Americans,
translation.zh: 我的美国同胞们

translation.en: I ask for your support.
translation.zh: 我请求你们的支持

translation.en: I have initiated a plan which will end this war
translation.zh: 我已经启动了一项计划 旨在结束战争

translation.en: in a way that will bring us closer to that great goal:
translation.zh: 能让我们离那个伟大的目标更近

translation.en: the goal of a just and lasting peace.
translation.zh: 实现公正和持久和平

translation.en: Johnny Cash was, like most Southerners,
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什跟大多数南方人一样

translation.en: supportive of the president's position and strategy in ending the war.
translation.zh: 支持总统结束战争的立场和策略

translation.en: From his TV show, he gets up there and he says...
translation.zh: 他在自己的电视节目上说

translation.en: My family here and I stand behind the President of the United States
translation.zh: 我和家人都支持美国总统

translation.en: in his quest for a just and lasting peace.
translation.zh: 追求公正和持久和平

translation.en: He's surrounded by a crew and by producers
translation.zh: 他身边的工作人员和制作人

translation.en: who are from California, who are from New York,
translation.zh: 他们来自加州 来自纽约

translation.en: who do not believe what they are hearing.
translation.zh: 他们不敢相信自己听到的话

translation.en: "What did you just do?
translation.zh: “你刚刚做了什么？

translation.en: You have just alienated half of your audience.
translation.zh: 你刚刚背离了一半的观众

translation.en: This is outrageous!"
translation.zh: 这太不像话了”

translation.en: Johnny Cash said, "You put that in or I do not come back to work."
translation.zh: 约翰尼说： “你们不播 我就不回来主持”

translation.en: They put it in.
translation.zh: 他们播了

translation.en: Johnny's message that goes out across the airwaves
translation.zh: 约翰尼的话传播开来

translation.en: gets to the White House,
translation.zh: 传到了白宫

translation.en: and the president writes a letter.
translation.zh: 总统写了一封信

translation.en: "Dear Mr. Cash,
translation.zh: “亲爱的卡什先生

translation.en: Pat and I were so appreciative of what you said about us.
translation.zh: 帕特和我都很感激你说的那番话

translation.en: We want to find an honorable end to the war.
translation.zh: 我们想光荣地结束战争

translation.en: Thank you for your support. Richard Nixon."
translation.zh: 谢谢你的支持 理查德尼克松”

translation.en: Johnny Cash had been
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什一直都是

translation.en: one of my favorites since the mid-1950s.
translation.zh: 50年代我最喜欢的歌手

translation.en: And so I started pushing, and others did,
translation.zh: 所以我开始推动 其他人也说

translation.en: "Let's being Johnny Cash to the White House!"
translation.zh: “我们把约翰尼卡什请到白宫来”

translation.en: [Joanne] One day, I was at work at the House of Cash
translation.zh: 有一天我在卡什之家工作…

translation.en: and we got a phone call from the White House.
translation.zh: （乔安妮卡什 约翰尼的妹妹/音乐家） …我们接到了白宫打来的电话

translation.en: And it was President Nixon.
translation.zh: 是尼克松总统

translation.en: We were sayin', "What? What?"
translation.zh: 我们说：“什么？”

translation.en: He had invited John and June and the Cash family
translation.zh: 他要求约翰、琼和卡什家族

translation.en: to come visit the White House, and for Johnny to sing
translation.zh: 参观白宫 约翰尼还要献唱… （白宫晚宴 1970年4月17日 周五）

translation.en: and do a concert there.
translation.zh: …还要在那里办一场演唱会

translation.en: Having Johnny Cash at the White House
translation.zh: 要求约翰尼卡什到白宫…

translation.en: symbolizes the kind of base that Richard Nixon was trying to appeal to,
translation.zh: （阿拉姆巴克希 尼克松演讲稿撰稿人） …象征着理查德尼克松 想要吸引的民众类型

translation.en: which wasn't a traditional Republican base:
translation.zh: 不是传统的共和党支持者

translation.en: blue collar Americans that did go for Nixon in millions,
translation.zh: 数百万支持尼克松的美国蓝领… （我们以尼克松为荣）

translation.en: and who liked Johnny Cash's music.
translation.zh: …喜欢约翰尼卡什音乐的人

translation.en: [Buchanan] Nixon liked classical music, but we persuaded him
translation.zh: 尼克松喜欢古典音乐 但我们说服他

translation.en: that this would be a great evening.
translation.zh: 这会是个美妙的夜晚…

translation.en: Also, culturally and socially,
translation.zh: （巴特布坎南 尼克松的资深顾问） …同样在文化和社会方面

translation.en: Johnny Cash represented Nashville, he represented country and western.
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什代表纳什维尔 他代表乡村和西部

translation.en: This is culturally us.
translation.zh: 这是我们的文化

translation.en: We had someone mainstream who had not been at Woodstock.
translation.zh: 我们请来没参加过 伍德斯托克音乐节的主流歌手

translation.en: He and June are over-the-top.
translation.zh: 他和琼非常高兴

translation.en: June goes out and gets herself a custom-made dress,
translation.zh: 琼去定制了一套礼服

translation.en: gorgeous, still in a museum.
translation.zh: 非常美 依然收藏在博物馆里

translation.en: Everybody wants to be on the guest list.
translation.zh: 大家都想出现在宾客名单上

translation.en: There's only 250 people that can get into the East Room,
translation.zh: 只有250个人能进入东厢

translation.en: and the White House had never seen anything like it.
translation.zh: 这是白宫前所未有的景象

translation.en: They got requests from literally everywhere
translation.zh: 他们真的是收到全国各地的请求

translation.en: to get a ticket to this moment.
translation.zh: 为了拿到入场券

translation.en: Anybody who wasn't Johnny Cash's friend suddenly became his friend,
translation.zh: 不是约翰尼卡什朋友的人 突然成了他的朋友

translation.en: and his friends became his best friends.
translation.zh: 他的朋友成了他最好的朋友

translation.en: President Nixon requested that my father perform "Okie from Muskogee"...
translation.zh: 尼克松总统要求我父亲 表演《来自穆斯科基的雇农》

translation.en: ♪ And I'm proud to be An Okie from Muskogee ♪
translation.zh: 我以身为一个来自 穆斯科基的俄克拉荷马人为荣

translation.en: ...which Merle Haggard had recorded that was a big country hit.
translation.zh: 梅尔哈格德创作的歌曲 当时很热门的乡村歌曲 （约翰卡特卡什 约翰尼的儿子）

translation.en: ♪ We don't smoke marijuana In Muskogee ♪
translation.zh: 我们穆斯科基人不抽大麻

translation.en: ♪ We don't burn our draft cards Down on Main Street... ♪
translation.zh: 我们不在大街上烧征兵卡…

translation.en: [Buchanan] It was about the values of somebody in Muskogee, Oklahoma,
translation.zh: 歌曲是关于俄克拉荷马 穆斯科基人的价值观

translation.en: and how their way of life differed utterly
translation.zh: 他们的生活方式

translation.en: from the counter-culture hippies from San Francisco.
translation.zh: 和旧金山的反文化嬉皮士完全不同

translation.en: [Stielper] The other was "Welfare Cadillac."
translation.zh: 另一首歌是《福利凯迪拉克》

translation.en: It was a very mean-spirited song that made fun of people who were on welfare.
translation.zh: 这是一首尖酸刻薄的歌曲 取笑那些领福利的人

translation.en: ♪ Well, I've never worked much ♪
translation.zh: 我从不努力工作

translation.en: ♪ In fact, I've been poor all my life ♪
translation.zh: 实际上我一生穷困

translation.en: ♪ I guess about all I really own Is ten kids and a wife ♪
translation.zh: 我猜我只有十个孩子和一位妻子

translation.en: ♪ Of course This house that I live in is mine ♪ ♪ But it's really a shack ♪
translation.zh: 我希望我住的这个房子是我的 但它真的只是个棚屋

translation.en: ♪ But I always managed To drive me a brand new Cadillac! ♪
translation.zh: 但我一直想办法 开一辆崭新的凯迪拉克

translation.en: [Stielper] When a press release went out from the White House staff
translation.zh: （白宫办公厅主任致尼克松夫人） 当白宫新闻稿发布

translation.en: that announced that President Nixon had requested that John sing those songs,
translation.zh: 宣称尼克松总统要求约翰唱这些歌

translation.en: immediately there was this brouhaha in the media.
translation.zh: 马上引起媒体一片哗然

translation.en: Country singer Johnny Cash is booked for a White House appearance April 17th.
translation.zh: 乡村歌手约翰尼卡什 预定出席4月17日的白宫晚宴

translation.en: The performance already is stirring some protest though.
translation.zh: 但表演已经引起一些抗议

translation.en: Not about the singer, but about a song.
translation.zh: 不是抗议歌手 而是一首歌

translation.en: [Dan Rather] The name of the song is on jukeboxes all over the country, "Welfare Cadillac,"
translation.zh: 全国的点唱机上都能找到这首歌 《福利凯迪拉克》

translation.en: a man who drives to pick up his welfare checks in a big automobile.
translation.zh: 一个男人开着一辆大车去领救济金

translation.en: [Stielper] It was on the CBS News.
translation.zh: CBS新闻大肆报道

translation.en: It was in Time magazine, in newspapers.
translation.zh: 登上《时代》杂志和各大报纸

translation.en: "Nixon wants Cash to sing these songs."
translation.zh: （《尼克松的数字》） 尼克松希望卡什唱这些歌

translation.en: Well, now there are some protests from welfare and civil rights leaders.
translation.zh: 福利和民权领袖有抗议的声音

translation.en: One says, "A song like that distorts the facts about welfare
translation.zh: 有人说：“这种歌曲扭曲 社会福利的事实

translation.en: and further irritates those who pay their taxes."
translation.zh: 更进一步激怒了纳税人

translation.en: How could the president ask for this song that put down citizens of this country?
translation.zh: 总统怎么会点这首贬低国民的歌？

translation.en: A White House spokesman said the president didn't know whether
translation.zh: 一位白宫发言人称总统不知道

translation.en: Johnny Cash would sing it or not.
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什会不会唱

translation.en: [Stielper] The response from the Cash side was
translation.zh: 卡什那边的回应是

translation.en: "Johnny's learning them now."
translation.zh: “约翰尼正在学唱”

translation.en: Johnny Cash says he will sing it at the White House
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什说他会在白宫唱

translation.en: if that's what the president wants. The White House says,
translation.zh: 如果总统想听 白宫称

translation.en: the president wants it.
translation.zh: 总统想听

translation.en: [Stielper] The president has asked John to come and sing
translation.zh: 总统要求约翰来献唱

translation.en: for this great cultural moment.
translation.zh: 为了这个伟大的文化时刻

translation.en: This is as great a stage as you could possibly imagine.
translation.zh: 这是你能想到的最好的舞台

translation.en: The politicians in the White House had another agenda, though.
translation.zh: 白宫的政客们另有想法

translation.en: They wanted to use Johnny Cash as part of their Southern strategy,
translation.zh: 他们想利用约翰卡什 作为他们南方策略的一部分

translation.en: especially as it related to the upcoming Senate election in Tennessee.
translation.zh: 特别是想将其与马上进行的 田纳西州参议员选举联系起来

translation.en: [Bakshian] Almost since the Civil War,
translation.zh: 几乎自南北战争以来… （1964年）

translation.en: Tennessee was a Democratic state,
translation.zh: 田纳西州一直是民主党的天下… （共和党 巴里戈德沃特 民主党 林登约翰逊）

translation.en: but with the Southern strategy,
translation.zh: …但有南方策略

translation.en: the new Republican party is being born in the South.
translation.zh: 新共和党在南方出现 （独立党 乔治华莱士）

translation.en: The old Democratic party is dying.
translation.zh: 旧民主党即将死亡

translation.en: I am target number one of the Southern strategy.
translation.zh: 我是南方策略的头号目标 （阿尔戈尔二世参议员 田纳西州 民主党）

translation.en: And President Nixon anointed in the White House
translation.zh: 尼克松总统在白宫指定

translation.en: his chosen instrument of the Southern strategy,
translation.zh: 他选定的南方策略工具

translation.en: Congressman Brock of Chattanooga.
translation.zh: 查塔努加的布洛克议员 （比尔布洛克 竞选美国参议员）

translation.en: Well, I appreciate your help my friend, very much.
translation.zh: 感谢你的帮助 非常感谢

translation.en: Good to see you.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你

translation.en: [Bakshian] And Bill Brock is one of the key people in the vanguard on the Southern strategy.
translation.zh: 比尔布洛克 是南方策略的先锋人物之一

translation.en: And William Brock III, whose conservative record has been unsullied
translation.zh: 威廉布洛克三世在众议院

translation.en: in eight years in the House of Representatives.
translation.zh: 八年的记录一直保持清廉

translation.en: [Bakshian] Bill Brock was being opposed by Tex Ritter
translation.zh: 比尔布洛克要和泰克斯立特

translation.en: for the Republican Senate nominee in Tennessee.
translation.zh: 争夺田纳西的共和党参议员提名

translation.en: -Hello there! -Hello.
translation.zh: -你好 哈利 -你好

translation.en: -Tex Ritter. -Good evening.
translation.zh: -泰克斯立特 -晚上好

translation.en: [Bakshian] Tex Ritter was an old Country Western singer.
translation.zh: 泰克斯立特曾经 是一位西部乡村乐歌手

translation.en: [Buchanan] Cash was a great friend of Tex Ritter's.
translation.zh: 卡什是泰克斯立特的好朋友

translation.en: There was a memo written by a guy named Murray Chotiner
translation.zh: 一位叫默里乔蒂纳的人 写过一份简报

translation.en: roughly a month prior to Johnny Cash appearing at the White House.
translation.zh: 大概就在卡什造访白宫前一个月

translation.en: It said, "To Bob Haldeman, From Murray Chotiner:
translation.zh: 简报写道 “默里乔蒂纳 写给鲍勃霍尔德曼

translation.en: Johnny Cash is great with a certain block of voters in Tennessee.
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什和 田纳西州选民的关系很好

translation.en: Obviously, he will not say or do anything against Tex Ritter,
translation.zh: 明显他不会说或者做任何 对泰克斯立特不利的事

translation.en: who is running for the US Senate against Congressman Bill Brock
translation.zh: 泰克斯正在竞选美国参议员 他要和比尔布洛克议员竞争

translation.en: for the GOP nomination.
translation.zh: 获得共和党提名

translation.en: At the Johnny Cash evening at the White House, it'll be most helpful
translation.zh: 在约翰尼卡什的白宫之夜 最有帮助的是

translation.en: if privately the president can neutralize Johnny Cash
translation.zh: 如果总统私下能说服卡什保持中立

translation.en: so he does not campaign for Tex Ritter."
translation.zh: 那么他就不会为泰克斯立特助选”

translation.en: Nixon was thematically appealing to the Silent Majority,
translation.zh: 尼克松一直用话题吸引沉默的大多数

translation.en: but more than wanting to take advantage of Johnny Cash,
translation.zh: 但不止想利用约翰尼卡什

translation.en: Richard Nixon really identified with him.
translation.zh: 理查德尼克松真的很认同卡什

translation.en: And he thought they were kindred souls
translation.zh: 他觉得两人志趣相投

translation.en: because they both had had really tough upbringings
translation.zh: 因为他们两人的童年都很辛苦

translation.en: and everything they got and everything they achieved
translation.zh: 他们得到的一切 完成的一切

translation.en: they had earned for themselves against tight odds.
translation.zh: 都是靠自己打拼艰难得来的

translation.en: Well, Nixon was raised by a sometimes abusive father.
translation.zh: 尼克松成长过程中 有时会被父亲虐待

translation.en: You know, out there on a struggling lemon farm in California.
translation.zh: 在加州一个勉强维持的柠檬农场里

translation.en: Two of his brothers died of tuberculosis.
translation.zh: 他的两个兄弟死于肺结核

translation.en: And he grew up poor, poor as hell.
translation.zh: 他在一贫如洗中长大

translation.en: And because of these parallels,
translation.zh: 因为这些相同的遭遇

translation.en: you know, Nixon, he thought he understood Johnny Cash.
translation.zh: 尼克松觉得自己理解约翰尼卡什

translation.en: He felt that he knew what kind of person Cash was.
translation.zh: 他觉得自己知道卡什是什么样的人

translation.en: But when someone's invited to perform at the White House,
translation.zh: 但有人受邀到白宫表演时

translation.en: there always is some political danger involved.
translation.zh: 总是会有政治风险

translation.en: During the Lyndon Johnson administration,
translation.zh: 但在林登约翰逊当政时期

translation.en: Lady Bird Johnson had a big event
translation.zh: 他的妻子举办了一场盛大晚宴

translation.en: where Eartha Kitt was invited to the White House,
translation.zh: 厄莎凯特受邀访问白宫

translation.en: where she proceeded to denounce Lyndon Johnson to his face
translation.zh: 他当着林登约翰逊的面

translation.en: for his Vietnam policies.
translation.zh: 谴责他的越南政策

translation.en: There was another time when that kind of thing happened.
translation.zh: 这种事还发生过一次

translation.en: President Nixon, stop bombing human beings, animals, and vegetation.
translation.zh: 尼克松总统 停止轰炸人类、动物和植物

translation.en: You go to church on Sundays and pray to Jesus Christ.
translation.zh: 你每周日去教堂向耶稣基督祷告 （停止杀戮）

translation.en: If Jesus Christ were here tonight, you would not dare drop another bomb.
translation.zh: 如此今晚耶稣基督在场 你绝对不敢再投下炸弹

translation.en: -[man] Throw her outta here! -[crowd] Yeah!
translation.zh: -请离开 -好

translation.en: All right. [chuckles nervously]
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [Butterfield] In Nixon's estimation,
translation.zh: 尼克松估计

translation.en: Johnny Cash wouldn't pose a risk to the White House.
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什不会对白宫造成风险

translation.en: But the Nixon administration may not have been aware
translation.zh: 但尼克松政府可能不知道

translation.en: that my father was paying attention to what was happening in the world.
translation.zh: 我父亲非常关心世界局势

translation.en: In example,
translation.zh: 比如说

translation.en: he was the champion for such rights as Native American rights.
translation.zh: 他支持美国原住民的权利

translation.en: This down here is where they were?
translation.zh: 他们以前住在这里吗？

translation.en: Yeah. They was all hunted down up this canyon...
translation.zh: 对 他们都被追赶到这个峡谷…

translation.en: across the creek over there.
translation.zh: （拉科塔松岭印第安人保留地 1968年12月） 跨过那边的小溪

translation.en: The American government, with Gatling guns, machine guns,
translation.zh: 美国政府拿着加特林机枪、机关枪

translation.en: killed innocent women and children
translation.zh: 残杀无辜的妇女和儿童…

translation.en: on December 29th, 1890 at Wounded Knee.
translation.zh: （比尔米勒 音乐家/卡什家的朋友） …1890年12月29日在伤膝河

translation.en: They shoved 'em into one mass grave.
translation.zh: 他们把尸体扔进万人坑

translation.en: The United States lied
translation.zh: 美国撒谎

translation.en: about the atrocities they've done against American Indians.
translation.zh: 掩盖他们对北美印第安人的暴行

translation.en: Johnny Cash came and heard the real stories.
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什实地走访 听到了真实的故事

translation.en: Is that the names of the people that are there?
translation.zh: 这是罹难者的名字吗？

translation.en: [Miller] Over a period of years,
translation.zh: 在一段时期内

translation.en: he met with several of the tribes that were still dealing with
translation.zh: 他和几个部落见了面 这些部落还在和

translation.en: the Bureau of Indian Affairs. There were still tribal land issues going on.
translation.zh: 印第安人事务局交涉 当时还有一些部落土地的问题

translation.en: People were seeing us as outsiders,
translation.zh: 人们觉得我们是外人

translation.en: and I think Johnny Cash always felt somewhat as an outcast
translation.zh: 我觉得约翰尼卡什一直觉得 自己是被遗弃的人

translation.en: trying to prove himself, not only to his father, but to a society that
translation.zh: 不仅是想向他父亲证明自己 也想向这个不接受

translation.en: didn't accept people who've been downtrodden.
translation.zh: 被压迫人民的社会证明自己

translation.en: The beauty of Johnny Cash was he'd bring it into the songs.
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什的美妙之处是 他用歌曲来表达

translation.en: Bitter Tears was a serious record about United States indigenous people,
translation.zh: 《伤心泪》是一张严肃唱片 关于美国原住民的故事

translation.en: and there was nothing like it in the world.
translation.zh: 在世界上绝无仅有

translation.en: He had songs like "The Ballad of Ira Hayes."
translation.zh: 收录的歌曲有《艾拉海斯的歌谣》

translation.en: Ira Hayes was a Pima Indian man who'd joined the Marines at a young age.
translation.zh: 艾拉海斯是皮马印第安人 年轻时加入海军陆战队

translation.en: He was one of the men who actually hoisted the flag
translation.zh: 硫磺岛战役胜利后 他是竖起国旗的

translation.en: upon victory in Iwo Jima.
translation.zh: 其中一名士兵

translation.en: ♪ And when that fight was over And when Old Glory raised ♪
translation.zh: 但战斗结束 竖起星条旗的人中

translation.en: ♪ Among the men to hold it high Was the Indian, Ira Hayes ♪
translation.zh: 有一位印第安人 艾拉海斯

translation.en: [John Carter] Ira Hayes died a sad, lonely death
translation.zh: 艾拉海斯孤独忧郁地死去

translation.en: at the hands of alcoholism and depression.
translation.zh: 因为酗酒和抑郁

translation.en: [Stielper] Johnny Cash, this atypical son of the South,
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什 这位非典型的南方之子

translation.en: is singing about social causes
translation.zh: 唱出了社会原因

translation.en: that aren't necessarily norms
translation.zh: 在田纳西、阿肯色

translation.en: for people to be hearing from Tennessee or Arkansas or Louisiana.
translation.zh: 或路易斯安那州的人听来不合常规

translation.en: The Bitter Tears album was boycotted by the music industry
translation.zh: 音乐行业抵制《伤心泪》专辑

translation.en: and John became enraged by that.
translation.zh: 约翰对此非常愤怒

translation.en: This offense brought out the rebel inside him.
translation.zh: 这种攻击激发出他内心的反叛

translation.en: He wrote a letter to the music industry,
translation.zh: 他写了一封信给音乐行业

translation.en: which he had published as a full-page ad
translation.zh: 在《公告牌》杂志上

translation.en: in Billboard magazine.
translation.zh: 以全版广告的形式登出

translation.en: [John Carter] "Why don't you play 'Ira Hayes'?"
translation.zh: 你为何不播放《艾拉海斯》？ （就一个问题：为什么？）

translation.en: It's like, hey, this song has purpose.
translation.zh: 这首歌有含义

translation.en: This song is important.
translation.zh: 这首歌很重要

translation.en: "Okay, country world, play this. I dare you."
translation.zh: “好的 乡村世界 敢不敢播”

translation.en: [Miller] Johnny Cash was giving a voice to us who weren't being heard.
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什 为我们这些被忽视的人发声

translation.en: [Stielper] And what the brain trust at the White House also didn't know
translation.zh: 白宫智囊团也不知道

translation.en: is that Johnny Cash had experienced the personal side of war.
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什亲身经历过战争

translation.en: His views were changing.
translation.zh: 他的观念一直在变

translation.en: ♪ His dying barely made The morning paper... ♪
translation.zh: 他的死几乎没有引起早报的注意…

translation.en: Jan Howard is a very well-known Grand Ole Opry star.
translation.zh: 扬霍华德是非常著名的 大奥普里剧院明星

translation.en: She sang with the Carter Family, with Johnny for many years.
translation.zh: 她和卡特家族以及约翰尼合作多年

translation.en: Jimmy, my oldest son, was drafted.
translation.zh: 我的长子杰米被征召入伍 （扬霍华德 歌手/作词者）

translation.en: He said, "Well, I'm no better than anybody else."
translation.zh: 他说我跟大家差不多

translation.en: He said, "I'll be fine."
translation.zh: 他说我会没事的

translation.en: [Cash] He grew up on a little farm just a couple of miles out of town.
translation.zh: 他在小农场长大 就在离镇子几里的地方

translation.en: Her son was in Vietnam
translation.zh: 他的儿子在越南

translation.en: and was killed.
translation.zh: 战死

translation.en: [Stielper] Johnny Cash was deeply upset.
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什非常难过

translation.en: He wrote a song called "Route #1, Box 144."
translation.zh: 他写了一首歌叫做 《一号公路144号信箱》

translation.en: It was a very...
translation.zh: 那首歌非常

translation.en: quietly eloquent statement
translation.zh: 安静地阐述了

translation.en: about war.
translation.zh: 战争的故事

translation.en: [Cash] His body was sent back on a plane, and then by train.
translation.zh: 他的尸体被飞机送回来 然后坐上火车回家

translation.en: [Stielper] Like so many in this country
translation.zh: 像这个国家的很多年轻人一样

translation.en: who were called out of the fields, called out of their homes,
translation.zh: （征兵抽签） 被征召离开田地和家乡

translation.en: off the assembly line, and sent to Vietnam.
translation.zh: 离开生产线 被派往越南

translation.en: ♪ ...thought that he was President or something ♪
translation.zh: …他是总统之类的人物

translation.en: ♪ At Route #1, Box 144 ♪
translation.zh: 在一号公路144号信箱

translation.en: My father always supported people within the Armed Forces.
translation.zh: 我父亲一直支持美军士兵

translation.en: Of course, my father himself served in the Air Force
translation.zh: 当然我父亲也曾在空军服役

translation.en: during the Korean conflict.
translation.zh: 在朝鲜战争期间

translation.en: He would set aside any political notion
translation.zh: 他把政治理念

translation.en: or any consideration of whether one certain battle was right or wrong,
translation.zh: 和战争是否对错的思考抛开

translation.en: and support the men and young women that were fighting
translation.zh: 支持在战场作战 为我们牺牲生命的

translation.en: and giving their lives for us.
translation.zh: 男女士兵

translation.en: And so, he went to Vietnam and performed for the troops.
translation.zh: 所以他去越南为军队表演

translation.en: ♪ Well, one morning at breakfast I said to my wife ♪
translation.zh: 有一天早餐时我跟妻子说

translation.en: ♪ We've been everywhere once And some places twice ♪
translation.zh: 我们什么地方都去过了 有些地方还去了两次

translation.en: ♪ As I had another helping Of country ham ♪
translation.zh: 在我叫她帮我 再拿一个乡村火腿的时候

translation.en: ♪ She said we've never been to Vietnam ♪
translation.zh: 她说我们从没去过越南

translation.en: ♪ There's a quarter of a million Of our boys over there... ♪
translation.zh: 我们有25万小伙子驻扎在那里

translation.en: [Stielper] He went to Vietnam in December of 1969,
translation.zh: （约翰尼卡什为军队表演 1969年 隆平空军基地 ） 他1969年12月去的越南

translation.en: just months before the White House concert.
translation.zh: 就在白宫演唱会前几个月

translation.en: And he and June laid there in the tent
translation.zh: 他和琼躺在帐篷里

translation.en: listening to the shells exploding,
translation.zh: 听着炮弹爆炸

translation.en: listening to the sounds of war,
translation.zh: 听着战争的声音

translation.en: of people dying,
translation.zh: 人们死去的声音

translation.en: of watching the carnage.
translation.zh: 看着屠杀景象

translation.en: It made a very serious impression on him.
translation.zh: 让他留下了深刻印象

translation.en: ♪ Then we did our last song For the night ♪
translation.zh: 然后我们表演了晚上最后一首歌

translation.en: ♪ And we crawled into bed For some peace and quiet ♪
translation.zh: 我们爬到床上 为寻得片刻安宁

translation.en: ♪ But things weren't peaceful ♪
translation.zh: 但局势并不安

translation.en: ♪ Things weren't quiet ♪
translation.zh: 局势并不宁

translation.en: I'd gone over with my father to Vietnam.
translation.zh: 我跟我父亲一起去越南

translation.en: I was at the airport, the Tan Son Nhat airport,
translation.zh: 我当时在新山一机场 准备…

translation.en: getting ready to fly back,
translation.zh: （杰米斯诺 约翰尼的牧师） …飞回来

translation.en: and I said, "That looks like John and June Cash!"
translation.zh: 我说： “那两人看起来 像约翰和琼卡什”

translation.en: And so I made my way over,
translation.zh: 所以我就走过去

translation.en: and I said, "John, what're you doing in Vietnam?"
translation.zh: 我说：“约翰 你在越南干什么？”

translation.en: He said, "I'm in a search mode right now."
translation.zh: 他说： “我在寻找答案”

translation.en: He said, "I'm troubled about what's happening here."
translation.zh: 他说： “这里发生的事让我很烦恼”

translation.en: He said, "You know, Jimmie, I was raised in a Baptist church in Arkansas.
translation.zh: 他说：“杰米 我在阿肯色州的 浸信教会长大

translation.en: I know what's right."
translation.zh: 我会分辨是非”

translation.en: He said, "What troubled me was it had taken our soldiers down."
translation.zh: 他说：“让我烦恼的是战争 让我们的士兵倒下”

translation.en: It had pulled their... their morale, their spirit down
translation.zh: 让他们的士气和精神低落

translation.en: because of what they heard back home.
translation.zh: 因为他们听说了家乡的情况 （消除贫困 不是杀人）

translation.en: Because of the way our country was so divided.
translation.zh: 因为我们国家分裂的方式 （轰炸伯克利）

translation.en: Some of them had reached a point where...
translation.zh: 有人达到了一个临界点

translation.en: "What're we doing this for? Why are we over here?"
translation.zh: “我们这么做是为什么？ 我们为什么在这里？” （立即实现和平）

translation.en: Because politics had entered so strongly
translation.zh: 因为政治强烈地

translation.en: into Vietnam.
translation.zh: 进入越南

translation.en: [voice trembling] They were... looking for
translation.zh: 他们 在寻找

translation.en: a little bit of hope.
translation.zh: 一点希望

translation.en: We prayed about that.
translation.zh: 我们为此祷告过

translation.en: Servicemen and prisoners have a lot in common.
translation.zh: 军人和囚犯有很多共同点

translation.en: There is a kind of a brotherhood about the whole situation.
translation.zh: 在整个形势下 有一种兄弟情义

translation.en: I think they feel a lot of the same things.
translation.zh: 我觉得他们有很多共同的感触

translation.en: The loneliness, and a lot of times, boredom,
translation.zh: 孤独 很多的无聊时光

translation.en: and isolation.
translation.zh: 离群索居

translation.en: [Snow] "And he said there are some things that I want to do
translation.zh: “他说我想做一些事

translation.en: that I feel like I need to do now with my voice."
translation.zh: 我想现在用我的声音去做”

translation.en: We oughta live every day just as though the Lord's coming!
translation.zh: 我们过得每一天 都要当成主将来临

translation.en: Doing all we can...
translation.zh: 力所能及…

translation.en: to help our neighbor!
translation.zh: 帮助我们的邻居

translation.en: And above all, loving!
translation.zh: 最重要的是爱

translation.en: One of the people who was watching Johnny Cash
translation.zh: 有一个人一直关注约翰尼卡什

translation.en: is this superstar preacher, the evangelist, Billy Graham.
translation.zh: 就是这位明星布道师比利格拉汉姆

translation.en: President Nixon and Dr. Graham had been friends for decades.
translation.zh: 尼克松总统和格拉汉姆博士 是几十年的好朋友

translation.en: Billy Graham called John and said, "May I meet Mr. Cash?
translation.zh: 比利格拉汉姆打电话给约翰说 “我能和卡什先生见面吗？

translation.en: My son is a rebellious teenager.
translation.zh: 我儿子是个叛逆青少年

translation.en: I want to ask John advice."
translation.zh: 我想听听约翰的意见”

translation.en: One Sunday in December 1969,
translation.zh: 1969年12月的一个周日

translation.en: Billy and Ruth Graham came to supper at the Cash's.
translation.zh: 比利和露丝格拉汉姆到卡什家吃晚饭

translation.en: Billy Graham says to him,
translation.zh: 比利格拉汉姆对他说

translation.en: "Johnny, you are somebody who speaks to youth
translation.zh: “约翰尼 你能和年轻人沟通

translation.en: because you are so authentic and that's what they are looking for today.
translation.zh: 因为你很真实 这就是他们今天追求的东西

translation.en: And I hope that you will use this gift
translation.zh: 我希望你能利用这个天赋

translation.en: to further good purpose
translation.zh: 推动良善

translation.en: in speaking to young people today."
translation.zh: 跟当今的年轻人对话”

translation.en: This is the Arkansas sharecropper's son,
translation.zh: 这位阿肯色州佃农的儿子

translation.en: sitting there listening to this.
translation.zh: 坐在那里听着这番话

translation.en: June is five months pregnant at the time. This is their first child together.
translation.zh: 那个时候琼怀孕五个月 这是他们的第一胎

translation.en: He hasn't necessarily been the best father
translation.zh: 对于在加州和前妻薇薇安生活的 四个女儿来说

translation.en: to his four girls that he left with Vivian in California.
translation.zh: 他未必是最好的父亲

translation.en: He is thinking about his responsibility to the future now.
translation.zh: 他在思考自己对于未来的责任

translation.en: And when Billy Graham left, John said to his father, "Well, Daddy,
translation.zh: 比利格拉汉姆离开后 约翰对他的父亲说：“爸爸

translation.en: Billy Graham just had supper in my house.
translation.zh: 比利格拉汉姆刚刚在我家吃晚饭

translation.en: That was pretty good, wasn't it?"
translation.zh: 那很棒 不是吗？”

translation.en: And Ray said, "You ain't shit, boy. That's nothing."
translation.zh: 雷说：“你真没出息 小子 那没什么”

translation.en: It was devastating.
translation.zh: 那句话很伤人

translation.en: Throughout his life, my father saw a lot of struggle, a lot of troubles.
translation.zh: 我父亲一生中经过许多挣扎和麻烦

translation.en: When I was born and I was healthy,
translation.zh: 我出生时很健康

translation.en: he was lifted up inside.
translation.zh: 他的心情就好起来

translation.en: [Tommy] He was just ecstatic.
translation.zh: 他欣喜若狂

translation.en: He thought that that was a great blessing.
translation.zh: 他认为那是上天的慷慨赐予

translation.en: [Stielper] Here's the chance to be the father that he never had to his own son.
translation.zh: 现在他成了父亲 有机会给他儿子 他自己没有得到的父爱

translation.en: -He's doing all right, ain't he, Mama? -[June] He's doing fine.
translation.zh: -他做得很好吧 妈妈？ -他做得很好

translation.en: [Stielper] John was so moved and inspired after meeting Billy Graham
translation.zh: 约翰见过比利格拉汉姆之后 既感动又受启发

translation.en: and becoming a father, that he wrote a new song
translation.zh: 当了爸爸 他写了一首新歌

translation.en: about young people and the future.
translation.zh: 关于年轻人和未来

translation.en: [Jim Lovell over radio] Uh, Houston, we've had a problem.
translation.zh: 休斯顿 我们有麻烦了

translation.en: [Stielper] As it happened, the same week as the White House concert,
translation.zh: 就在白宫演唱会那周发生

translation.en: the Apollo 13 astronauts were stranded in space.
translation.zh: 阿波罗13号的宇航员困在太空中

translation.en: [reporter] The Apollo 13 space craft has had a serious power supply malfunction.
translation.zh: 阿波罗13号宇宙飞船 出现了严重的电源故障

translation.en: But they came down to Earth safely.
translation.zh: 但他们平安降落地球

translation.en: [reporter 2] Just a beautiful sight to see!
translation.zh: 真是美丽的景象

translation.en: [man] And welcome home!
translation.zh: 欢迎回家 （他们顺利回家！）

translation.en: Theirs is the spirit that built America.
translation.zh: 这是建立美国的精神

translation.en: Johnny Cash would be at the White House that night.
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什那晚会在白宫

translation.en: We arrived at the White House that very afternoon that Apollo 13 splashed down.
translation.zh: 我们在阿波罗13号溅落的 那天下午到达白宫

translation.en: We were excited to go.
translation.zh: 我们很兴奋 （唐里德 史泰特勒兄弟合唱团 与卡什一起巡演）

translation.en: Although, you know, there was a lot of turmoil with the war going on,
translation.zh: （唐里德 史泰特勒兄弟合唱团 与卡什一起巡演） 虽然我们知道发生了很多战争骚乱

translation.en: and marching in the streets and violence
translation.zh: 街头游行和暴力

translation.en: and a lot of hatred on both sides.
translation.zh: 两边积怨很深

translation.en: But we said, "No, this is the White House. This is history."
translation.zh: 但我们说：“不 这是白宫 这是历史”

translation.en: We were looking forward to this.
translation.zh: 我们很期待这一刻

translation.en: [Stielper] The president had so many Southern Congressmen,
translation.zh: 总统邀请了很多南方议员

translation.en: White House staff.
translation.zh: 白宫工作人员

translation.en: HR Haldeman, the White House Chief of Staff,
translation.zh: HR霍尔德曼 白宫幕僚长

translation.en: who was a great, great Johnny Cash fan,
translation.zh: 他是约翰尼卡什的超级歌迷

translation.en: was there, as were other people in the Nixon administration.
translation.zh: 还有尼克松政府的其他人员

translation.en: They were all clamoring to get in. It was very, very tight.
translation.zh: 他们都想参加 管制非常严

translation.en: These were all prominent conservative supporters of the president.
translation.zh: 这些都是总统重要的保守派支持者

translation.en: John invited his family.
translation.zh: 约翰邀请他的家人

translation.en: All of his siblings were there.
translation.zh: 他所有的兄弟姐妹也来了

translation.en: His father, Ray, was there.
translation.zh: 他的父亲雷也在

translation.en: It's the first time he's ever worn a tux in his life.
translation.zh: 这是他第一次穿燕尾服

translation.en: [Joanne] And I remember we had these beautiful long dresses.
translation.zh: 我记得我们穿那些漂亮的长礼服

translation.en: We're actually in the White House with the president.
translation.zh: 我们在白宫和总统一起

translation.en: It was awesome and scary and wonderful, all at the same time.
translation.zh: 真的是既美好又让人惊慌

translation.en: [John Carter] I would've been barely over one month old
translation.zh: 当时我才一个多月大

translation.en: when they put me down for a nap in the Lincoln bed.
translation.zh: 他们把我放到林肯床上小憩

translation.en: [Nixon] We're very happy to welcome all of you tonight at this evening at the White House.
translation.zh: 很高兴各位今晚来到白宫

translation.en: It's rather hard to describe Johnny Cash in terms that are perhaps adequate.
translation.zh: 很难用言语来形容约翰尼卡什

translation.en: The music that he represents tonight
translation.zh: 他今晚代表的音乐

translation.en: is called country music and western music,
translation.zh: 被称为乡村音乐和西部音乐

translation.en: but I think it's really American music,
translation.zh: 但我觉得都是美国音乐 因为

translation.en: because it speaks in stories about America,
translation.zh: 但我觉得都是美国音乐 因为 讲的是美国的故事

translation.en: in a way that touches the hearts of all Americans, north, east,
translation.zh: 感动全美人民的心 北部、东部

translation.en: west, and south.
translation.zh: 西部、南部

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, Johnny Cash.
translation.zh: 女士们、先生们 有请约翰尼卡什

translation.en: [Reid] I was a little bit uptight because you never know exactly what's going to work.
translation.zh: 我有点紧张 因为不知道会发生什么事

translation.en: This is a different audience.
translation.zh: 这次的观众不一样

translation.en: And when you put a tuxedo and gowns on people,
translation.zh: 人穿上燕尾服和礼服

translation.en: they become different people.
translation.zh: 他们也变得不一样了

translation.en: They're not as loose and as jovial as they usually are.
translation.zh: 他们不像平常那样放松和快乐

translation.en: Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢

translation.en: You got the president and the first lady sitting in the first row staring at you,
translation.zh: 总统和第一夫人坐在第一排盯着你看

translation.en: and you think, "Wow, let's hope this comes off."
translation.zh: 你想 “希望不要出错”

translation.en: [Cash] We hope to show you a little bit of the soul of the South tonight.
translation.zh: 希望今晚能让你们 听见一点南方的灵魂

translation.en: ♪ Well, they gave him his orders At Monroe, Virginia... ♪
translation.zh: 他们在弗吉尼亚门罗给他下了命令…

translation.en: I never had any idea what we were gonna play.
translation.zh: 我不知道我们要表演什么

translation.en: It didn't do any good to rehearse with Johnny Cash
translation.zh: 跟约翰尼卡什排练没什么用 （WS霍兰德 约翰尼的鼓手）

translation.en: because he didn't know what he was going do.
translation.zh: 因为他也不知道要做什么

translation.en: ♪ ...poor boy ♪
translation.zh: …可怜的孩子

translation.en: My father made a decision and refused to sing the two songs
translation.zh: 我父亲做出决定 拒绝演唱

translation.en: that the president had asked him to sing.
translation.zh: 总统要他唱的那两首歌

translation.en: [Cash] Daddy. Daddy, you remember this.
translation.zh: 爸爸 你记得这首歌

translation.en: ♪ How high is the water, Papa? ♪
translation.zh: 水位有多高 爸爸？

translation.en: ♪ He said It's two feet high and rising... ♪
translation.zh: 他说有60公分 还在升高

translation.en: However, the president and the audience did not know
translation.zh: 但是总统和观众不知道

translation.en: or have any idea what he would sing.
translation.zh: 不知道他要唱什么

translation.en: ♪ High and rising... ♪
translation.zh: 还在升高…

translation.en: I get asked a lot of questions about war and...
translation.zh: 很多人问我战争

translation.en: drugs and youth and...
translation.zh: 毒品和年轻人的问题

translation.en: this and that. Well...
translation.zh: 诸如此类的问题

translation.en: We took our show to Long Bihn Air Force Base near Saigon, Vietnam.
translation.zh: 我们在越南西贡附近的 隆平空军基地表演过

translation.en: We did shows for the men over there,
translation.zh: 为那里的军人表演

translation.en: as many as we could for the time that we had.
translation.zh: 尽量在仅有的时间内多表演几场

translation.en: Somebody said, "That makes you a hawk. You went to Vietnam."
translation.zh: 有人说：“你去了越南 是鹰派”

translation.en: No, but after you watch the wounded come in in the helicopters,
translation.zh: 不 但当你看见伤兵被抬进直升机后

translation.en: if you were a dove, you might come away a dove with claws.
translation.zh: 就是你是鸽派 也是只有爪子的鸽子

translation.en: [Reid] All of a sudden, John got very quiet.
translation.zh: 突然 约翰变得很平静

translation.en: We were in trouble...
translation.zh: 我们陷入麻烦…

translation.en: We're waiting with these solemn looks on our faces. "What's going on?"
translation.zh: 我们一脸严肃地在等 怎么回事？

translation.en: [Cash] Of course, um,
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: in order to say something to somebody that might be meaningful, you...
translation.zh: 为了对一些人说有意义的话

translation.en: gotta kind of get them on your side.
translation.zh: 你要让他们站在你这一边

translation.en: So I had these words, a poem that I wrote to the youth of America.
translation.zh: 我有这些话 我写给美国年轻人的一首诗

translation.en: ♪ And the lonely voice of youth cries ♪
translation.zh: 年轻的孤独声音在呼喊

translation.en: ♪ "What is truth?" ♪
translation.zh: “什么是真相？”

translation.en: ♪ Little boy of three Sitting on the floor ♪
translation.zh: 三岁小男孩坐在地板上

translation.en: ♪ Looks up and says "Daddy, what is war?" ♪
translation.zh: 抬起头问 ：“爸爸 什么是战争？”

translation.en: ♪ "Son, that's when people Fight and die" ♪
translation.zh: “儿子 就是有人斗争和死亡”

translation.en: ♪ Little boy of three says "Daddy, why?" ♪
translation.zh: 三岁小男孩问： “爸爸 为什么？”

translation.en: ♪ A young man of 17 in Sunday school ♪
translation.zh: 主日学校的17岁男孩

translation.en: ♪ Being taught the Golden Rule ♪
translation.zh: 学校教给他黄金法则

translation.en: ♪ And by the time Another year has gone around ♪
translation.zh: 当又一年过去的时候

translation.en: ♪ It may be his turn To lay his life down ♪
translation.zh: 也许轮到他牺牲生命了

translation.en: ♪ Can you blame the voice of youth For asking ♪
translation.zh: 你能怪罪这个年轻的声音问

translation.en: ♪ "What is truth?" ♪
translation.zh: “什么是真相？”

translation.en: I saw the squirming in Nixon's chair when Johnny was singing "What is Truth."
translation.zh: 约翰尼唱到“什么是真相”的时候 我看见尼克松的椅子动了一下

translation.en: Nixon was smart enough and attentive enough to be uncomfortable.
translation.zh: 尼克松足够聪明和专注 所以才会不舒服 （亚历山大巴特菲尔德 尼克松的副幕僚长）

translation.en: ♪ Young man sitting On the witness stand ♪
translation.zh: 年轻人坐在证人席上

translation.en: ♪ Man with a book says ♪
translation.zh: 拿着《圣经》的人说 “举起你的手 跟我说

translation.en: ♪ "Raise your hand, repeat after me I solemnly swear" ♪
translation.zh: 拿着《圣经》的人说 “举起你的手 跟我说 我庄严发誓…”

translation.en: ♪ Judge looked down at his long hair ♪
translation.zh: 法官看着他的长发

translation.en: ♪ And although the young man Solemnly swore ♪
translation.zh: 虽然这位年轻人已经庄严宣誓

translation.en: ♪ Nobody seemed to hear anymore ♪
translation.zh: 大家似乎都没听见

translation.en: ♪ And it didn't really matter If the truth was there ♪
translation.zh: 有没有真相真的不重要

translation.en: ♪ It was the cut of his clothes And the length of his hair ♪
translation.zh: 这是他衣服的剪裁和头发的长度

translation.en: ♪ And the lonely voice of youth cries ♪
translation.zh: 年轻的孤独声音在呼喊

translation.en: ♪ "What is truth?" ♪
translation.zh: “什么是真相？”

translation.en: ♪ Young girl dancing to the latest beat ♪
translation.zh: 年轻姑娘跳到曲终

translation.en: ♪ Found new ways to move her feet ♪
translation.zh: 发掘她的舞步

translation.en: ♪ Young man speaking in the city square ♪
translation.zh: 年轻男孩在广场上演讲

translation.en: ♪ Trying to tell somebody that he cares ♪
translation.zh: 想要告诉别人他在乎

translation.en: ♪ Yeah, the ones That you're callin' wild ♪
translation.zh: 对 那些你们成为疯子的人

translation.en: ♪ Gonna be the leaders In a little while ♪
translation.zh: 稍后将成为领袖

translation.en: ♪ This old world's waking To a newborn day ♪
translation.zh: 旧世界将要重生

translation.en: ♪ And I solemnly swear That it'll be their way ♪
translation.zh: 我庄严发誓 这就是他们的方式

translation.en: ♪ We better help that Voice of youth find ♪
translation.zh: 我们最好帮助那个年轻的声音找到

translation.en: ♪ "What is truth?" ♪
translation.zh: 什么是真相

translation.en: ♪ And the lonely voice of youth cries "What is truth?" ♪
translation.zh: 年轻的孤独声音在呼喊 “什么是真相？”

translation.en: Johnny had a way to say something in a song
translation.zh: 约翰尼能用歌曲叙事

translation.en: to get a point across,
translation.zh: 表达观点

translation.en: and he did it well.
translation.zh: 他做得很好

translation.en: The most powerful man in the United States at that time,
translation.zh: 那个时候美国最有权力的人

translation.en: I think it got to him.
translation.zh: 我想歌曲触动到他了

translation.en: He understood the message.
translation.zh: 他理解了这则讯息

translation.en: [John Carter] My father wasn't afraid to say what he thought,
translation.zh: 我父亲不怕说出自己的想法

translation.en: which was, "I hope to bring peace. But I'm not afraid to get dirty.
translation.zh: 就是 “我希望带来和平 但我不怕弄脏双手

translation.en: And I'm not afraid to fight for what I believe in.
translation.zh: 我不怕为我的信念斗争

translation.en: And I'm not afraid to go where I'm uncomfortable
translation.zh: 我不怕去让我不舒服的地方

translation.en: to stand up for love.
translation.zh: 为爱挺身而出

translation.en: I'm a dove with claws."
translation.zh: 我是有爪子的鸽子”

translation.en: [Stielper] Johnny Cash was putting himself front-and-center.
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什勇敢地站出来

translation.en: He had gone out on a limb there.
translation.zh: 他拼劲全力

translation.en: This song was delivering a message
translation.zh: 这首歌传递了一则讯息

translation.en: that the current leaders who were looking on young people
translation.zh: 目前的领导人 他们旁观青少年

translation.en: and marginalizing them need to understand that
translation.zh: 排斥年轻人 这些领导人需要明白

translation.en: this is the future,
translation.zh: 这就是未来

translation.en: and we need to honor and respect that.
translation.zh: 我们需要对此表示尊重

translation.en: Mr. Nixon, whose personal taste in music runs more to tunes from South Pacific,
translation.zh: 尼克松先生的个人音乐品味 比较偏向于南太平洋音乐

translation.en: threw himself into the foot-tapping spirit of Cash's twanging guitar,
translation.zh: 让自己沉浸在卡什轻快的吉他声中

translation.en: and when it was over, heaped praise on the entire troupe.
translation.zh: 表演结束后给予整个乐队热烈掌声

translation.en: The closest Cash came to a song with obvious political overtones
translation.zh: 卡什最具政治色彩的一首歌曲

translation.en: has a theme not from the '30s,
translation.zh: 主题并不是来自30年代

translation.en: but from now,
translation.zh: 而是现在

translation.en: and the thrust of it seemed to surprise the president a bit.
translation.zh: 这一举动似乎让总统有点意外

translation.en: Johnny Cash, you've played country fairs,
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什 你在乡村音乐节

translation.en: Grand Ole Oprys and before prison audiences.
translation.zh: 大奥普里剧院和监狱观众面前表演过

translation.en: Was it any different tonight,
translation.zh: 今晚有没有不同

translation.en: playing before the President of the United States and at the White House?
translation.zh: 在白宫总统尼克松面前表演？

translation.en: Well, in several ways, it was, Dan.
translation.zh: 有几个地方不一样 丹

translation.en: It was quite different, uh...
translation.zh: 完全不一样

translation.en: We were playing for some very important people tonight, of course.
translation.zh: 当然今晚我们为一些 很重要的人士表演

translation.en: I tried to keep the performance honest.
translation.zh: 我尽量让表演真诚

translation.en: Good or bad,
translation.zh: 不管好坏

translation.en: it was honest, I think.
translation.zh: 我想它是真诚的

translation.en: My dad would never, in his life, disrespect the office of the presidency.
translation.zh: 我爸爸一辈子绝对不会 对总统办公室无礼

translation.en: It was part of his patriotism.
translation.zh: 这是他爱国主义的一部分

translation.en: He had a history of being bold.
translation.zh: 他向来很大胆

translation.en: But his performance at the White House was a turning point.
translation.zh: 但他在白宫的表演是转折点

translation.en: [Snow] Evidently, John knew something or picked up on something
translation.zh: 显然约翰知道一些事 或者注意到一些事

translation.en: and I think he was trying to say,
translation.zh: 我觉得他想强有力的

translation.en: powerfully, to President Nixon,
translation.zh: 对尼克松总统说

translation.en: "You need to think about what you're doing.
translation.zh: “你需要考虑一下自己的所作所为

translation.en: And you need to be truthful."
translation.zh: 你需要诚实”

translation.en: Who would have ever thought that that song would have been so prophetic?
translation.zh: 谁会想到那首歌会一语成谶？

translation.en: I have concluded that the time has come for action.
translation.zh: （1970年4月30日） 我决定现在应该采取行动

translation.en: Attacks are being launched this week to clean out major enemy sanctuaries
translation.zh: 这星期发动的攻势要清除 柬埔寨和越南边界的

translation.en: on the Cambodian/Vietnam border.
translation.zh: 主要敌人巢穴

translation.en: Shortly after the Johnny Cash event,
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什表演过后不久

translation.en: Nixon announced the Cambodian Incursion.
translation.zh: 尼克松宣布入侵柬埔寨 （柬埔寨 南越）

translation.en: The speech basically said that Americans are going to be fighting in Cambodia.
translation.zh: 那次演说基本上是称 美国人将在柬埔寨作战

translation.en: Cambodia was a neutral country.
translation.zh: 柬埔寨是中立国

translation.en: Nixon had been bombing it secretly, without Congressional approval,
translation.zh: 尼克松在未得到国会授权 在美国人不知情的情况下

translation.en: and without the knowledge of the American people.
translation.zh: 秘密轰炸柬埔寨

translation.en: [Stielper] It galvanized those who said, "Well, wait a minute.
translation.zh: （阻止尼克松滥杀无辜） 此举刺激了那些说：“等等

translation.en: We're supposed to be getting out of Vietnam.
translation.zh: 我们应该撤出越南

translation.en: Now, we're expanding the war."
translation.zh: 现在我们要扩大战争”的人

translation.en: [Snow] We all thought he was doing one thing,
translation.zh: 我们都以为他在做一件事

translation.en: and they were actually doing another.
translation.zh: 其实他们在做另外一件事

translation.en: Nixon lied not only to America
translation.zh: 尼克松不仅欺骗美国人…

translation.en: but to our soldiers.
translation.zh: （越南退伍军人和平组织） 还欺骗了美军士兵

translation.en: The country went into flames.
translation.zh: 全国民怨沸腾

translation.en: [Buchanan] At Kent State University, there had been riots.
translation.zh: （肯特州立大学 1970年5月4日） 肯特州立大学发生暴乱

translation.en: National Guard troops were on the campuses.
translation.zh: 国民警卫队进驻校园

translation.en: Instantly, there were four dead and nine wounded.
translation.zh: 马上造成四人死亡 九人受伤

translation.en: [Stielper] Kent State happened two weeks after the White House performance.
translation.zh: 肯特州立大学事件 发生于白宫表演两周后

translation.en: For all of his support for the president and for the government,
translation.zh: 他原本全力支持总统和政府

translation.en: Johnny Cash was blindsided.
translation.zh: 约翰尼卡什被摆了一道

translation.en: John didn't like the idea of being used.
translation.zh: 约翰不喜欢被利用

translation.en: [Cash] Those young people out there seem to be
translation.zh: 那些年轻人似乎

translation.en: trying to hold on to that part of our American heritage
translation.zh: 希望保留美国传统中

translation.en: that they believe was good and beautiful.
translation.zh: 善良美好的一部分

translation.en: All they desire is to be listened to.
translation.zh: 他们只是希望有人倾听

translation.en: They're only exercising their freedom of speech
translation.zh: 他们只是在行使言论自由

translation.en: and God help you if that's ever taken away from them, America.
translation.zh: 要是美国人没有言论自由 上帝保佑你们

translation.en: John starts thinking much harder about the totality of what's going on.
translation.zh: 约翰开始认真思考当前局势
